articles.title: U.S. condemns 'war crimes' after Russia drone attack hits Kyiv apartment block - Reuters
articles.description: The United States will hold Russia accountable for "war crimes", the White House said on Monday, hours after Russia attacked Ukrainian cities with drones during morning rush hour, killing at least <a href="/world/europe/kyiv-rocked-by-several-blasts-mayor-202…
